headline.main: Barkov Scores With 28.1 Left, Leads Panthers Past Canadiens
headline.print_headline: Barkov Scores With 28.1 Left, Leads Panthers Past Canadiens

docs.snippet: Aleksander Barkov scored the winning goal with 28.1 seconds left and the Florida Panthers rallied from a three-goal deficit to defeat the Montreal Canadiens 4-3 on Saturday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Aleksander Barkov scored the winning goal with 28.1 seconds left and the Florida Panthers rallied from a three-goal deficit to defeat the Montreal Canadiens 4-3 on Saturday night.

headline.main: Argentine Experts Question Report on Missing Mexico Students
headline.print_headline: Argentine Experts Question Report on Missing Mexico Students

docs.snippet: Argentine forensic experts who have studied a dump in southern Mexico where government officials claim the bodies of 43 missing students were burned said Saturday that results from a new investigation of the site are incomplete and inconclusive....
docs.lead_paragraph: Argentine forensic experts who have studied a dump in southern Mexico where government officials claim the bodies of 43 missing students were burned said Saturday that results from a new investigation of the site are incomplete and inconclusive.

headline.main: Gunmen Seize Four Tugboat Crew Off Eastern Malaysia
headline.print_headline: Gunmen Seize Four Tugboat Crew Off Eastern Malaysia

docs.snippet: Gunmen seized four Malaysian crew of a tugboat off the coast of the eastern state of Sabah, a week after a similar attack on a Taiwanese tugboat in the southern Philippines, media reported on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gunmen seized four Malaysian crew of a tugboat off the coast of the eastern state of Sabah, a week after a similar attack on a Taiwanese tugboat in the southern Philippines, media reported on Sunday.

headline.main: Crime Spike in St. Louis Traced to Cheap Heroin and Mexican Cartels
headline.print_headline: Violence in St. Louis Traced to Cheap Mexican Heroin

docs.snippet: In recent years, Mexican drug traffickers have inundated the St. Louis area with a new, potent form of heroin, drastically reducing prices to lure suburban users....
docs.abstract: Rising gang violence and shootings in St Louis are partially attributed to heroin epidemic affecting area; influx of new low-cost version of heroin introduced to market by Mexican drug cartels in recent years have attracted suburban customers and encouraged turf wars among gangs with deadly consequences.
docs.lead_paragraph: In recent years, Mexican drug traffickers have inundated the St. Louis area with a new, potent form of heroin, drastically reducing prices to lure suburban users.

headline.main: Lightning Beat Devils 3-1, but Lose Stamkos to Blood Clot
headline.print_headline: Lightning Beat Devils 3-1, but Lose Stamkos to Blood Clot

docs.snippet: The Tampa Bay Lightning's strong third period in a win over New Jersey was greatly overshadowed by the news that captain Steven Stamkos will miss one to three months because of a blood clot in his arm....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Tampa Bay Lightning's strong third period in a win over New Jersey was greatly overshadowed by the news that captain Steven Stamkos will miss one to three months because of a blood clot in his arm.

headline.main: O'Reilly Scores Twice, Sabres Deny Rangers With 4-3 Win
headline.print_headline: O'Reilly Scores Twice, Sabres Deny Rangers With 4-3 Win

docs.snippet: With the start of the Stanley Cup playoffs less than two weeks away, the New York Rangers aren't playing like a team that wants to be there....
docs.lead_paragraph: With the start of the Stanley Cup playoffs less than two weeks away, the New York Rangers aren't playing like a team that wants to be there.

headline.main: Saad's 1st Career Hat Trick Helps Columbus Beat Carolina 5-1
headline.print_headline: Saad's 1st Career Hat Trick Helps Columbus Beat Carolina 5-1

docs.snippet: Brandon Saad scored three goals for his first career hat trick, and the Columbus Blue Jackets beat the Carolina Hurricanes 5-1 on Saturday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brandon Saad scored three goals for his first career hat trick, and the Columbus Blue Jackets beat the Carolina Hurricanes 5-1 on Saturday night.

headline.main: AP Source: Kaepernick Meets With Elway
headline.print_headline: AP Source: Kaepernick Meets With Elway

docs.snippet: A person with knowledge of the meeting tells The Associated Press that quarterback Colin Kaepernick met with Broncos GM John Elway at Elway's Denver home last week to talk about restructuring his contract as part of a trade with the San Francisco ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A person with knowledge of the meeting tells The Associated Press that quarterback Colin Kaepernick met with Broncos GM John Elway at Elway's Denver home last week to talk about restructuring his contract as part of a trade with the San Francisco 49ers.

headline.main: Officer Sues, Claiming Department Shared Nude Photos of Her
headline.print_headline: Officer Sues, Claiming Department Shared Nude Photos of Her

docs.snippet: A police officer in Ohio is suing the city of Columbus and department administrators claiming nude photos of her were illegally obtained and improperly shared among officers during an internal investigation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A police officer in Ohio is suing the city of Columbus and department administrators claiming nude photos of her were illegally obtained and improperly shared among officers during an internal investigation.
